data.title: Epistolae: Genealogy: Conrad
data.meta_description:
Table 2.1 Descendants of Henry I of Germany -- Line of Gisela of Swabia and Conrad II of GermanyConrad II Emperor d. 1039
+Gisela of Swabia d. 1043
|---Henry III Emperor d. 1056
    +Kunegund of England d. 1038
    |---Beatrice Abbess of Quedlinburg     +Agnes of Poitiers (Aia) d. 1077
    |---Matilda of Germany duchess of Swabia d. 1060
    |   +Rudolf I of Swabia and anti-king of Germany d. 1080
    |---Judith of Swabia queen of Hungary and princess of Poland d.
